attributes.action: Give right to satisfy obligations and right of appeal to sponsor/visit visa
attributes.background: U.K. Residents spend lots of money on visa of loved one to visit them, we can't go all the time to visit them so tried that way to see them here but visa's got refuse with no right to satisfy the obligations and no right of appeal which is very disturbing for tax payers whose money get vanished.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the Government  to change the rules on visas.
